channel.title: [PROGRAM]Server status Checker
channel.description:
Since a lot of people are now complaining about moparscape's faulty server status checker page,
I've decided to post one that i am currently using. It is not my own program.
[URL=http://www.file.sc/10faf3/ShimmyStatus.rar]Click here for status checker program[/URL]
EDIT: SHIMMYSHINE and BITBLASTER made this program.

item.title: [PROGRAM]Server status Checker
item.dc:creator: @Cultivated Cultivated
item.description:
@Cultivated wrote:

Archive is corrupt, avast scan came up clean, files 0kb.

Oh…I didn’t notice “i r3n4life i” dug this up from september 06…Sorry guys!
